rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Central seating area with traditional Kerala design elements, open plan to view courtyard and pool.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to living area with a direct opening to the courtyard. Traditional wooden furniture and stone accents.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Fully equipped kitchen designed for functionality with traditional Kerala motifs; includes storage spaces and modern amenities integrated with local design.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with private balcony overlooking the courtyard. Traditional Kerala style wooden furniture and local artisanal finishes.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy bedroom with a small sitting area. Maintains traditional Kerala style, ensuring privacy and serenity.

rooms.name: Children's Bedroom
rooms.description: Safe, vibrant bedroom with a study area. Designed to incorporate traditional Kerala design elements while being kid-friendly.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Functional guest bathroom with modern fixtures integrated into a traditional setting, ensuring privacy and convenience.

rooms.name: Powder Room
rooms.description: Small restroom near the entrance for guests with traditional Kerala finishes and modern plumbing.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: Traditional Kerala wooden door with intricate carvings, welcoming guests into the bungalow.

openings.name: Courtyard Openings
openings.description: Multiple openings leading from rooms to the central courtyard, designed with Vastu principles ensuring proper air circulation and energy flow.

openings.name: Pool Area Opening
openings.description: Direct access from the living area to an adjoining swimming pool area, integrating modern recreational spaces with traditional aesthetics.

additional_elements.name: Central Courtyard
additional_elements.description: A spacious open courtyard at the center of the bungalow, acting as a light well and communal space. Designed with Vastu principles to enhance energy flow.

additional_elements.name: Swimming Pool
additional_elements.description: A recreational swimming pool area adjoining the courtyard, designed in a modern style while keeping traditional Kerala landscaping aesthetics.

vastu_considerations.detail: The main entrance and key living spaces face north-east to maximize positivity as per Vastu guidelines.
Central courtyard enhances natural light and ventilation, in line with traditional design and Vastu principles.
Integration of water (pool), earth (solid architecture) and fire (cooking areas) is carefully balanced to maintain harmony.

notes: Plot dimensions: 80x100 feet ensure adequate space for the layout.
G+1 structure means an additional level (upper floor) will incorporate similar living spaces, ensuring symmetry between floors.
Design adheres to traditional Kerala aesthetics including wooden beams, sloping roofs, and decorative motifs while meeting modern functional requirements.
